summary: Build a professional, mobile-friendly fintech-style website called “InvestSmart AI” featuring an AI chatbot that risk-profiles beginner investors and returns asset-allocation-based investment recommendations, plus supporting pages (Learn Investing/blogs, SIP Calculator, About, Disclaimer).
architectural_notes: Chatbot flow: risk profiling Q&A -> classify user (conservative/moderate/aggressive) -> produce recommendation output.
Recommendation templates: Conservative (60% debt/30% index/10% gold), Moderate (50% equity/30% debt/10% gold/10% hybrid), Aggressive (80% equity/10% gold/10% debt).
Include compliance messaging: recommendations are educational only and not SEBI advice.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fintech wordmark logo reading “InvestSmart AI”, clean minimal vector style, blue/green on white (investsmart-logo.dim_512x128.png)
- Modern fintech hero illustration with abstract growth chart + coins + shield motif, minimal flat style, blue/green palette on white (investsmart-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 3 minimal line icons: shield, pie chart, and rocket; consistent stroke style; blue/green (investsmart-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-friendly homepage for “InvestSmart AI” with a clean fintech landing layout that explains risk profiling and includes a primary CTA button labeled “Get My Investment Plan”. The homepage must include clear sections covering: Why invest, Power of compounding, Risk vs return, and Diversification.

Implement the InvestSmart AI chatbot UI that guides the user through the required risk profiling flow in a conversational, step-by-step format, collecting: age, monthly income, investment goal, investment horizon, risk tolerance choice, and investment knowledge level.

Implement the chatbot final output screen that shows: Risk Profile Result, an Asset Allocation Pie Chart (if possible), a Monthly SIP suggestion, 3 model portfolios, and a Do’s and Don’ts list, using the backend recommendation response.
Create a “Learn Investing” page that presents blog-style educational content for beginner investors in a simple, GenZ-friendly tone (no complex jargon).
Create a SIP Calculator page that lets users input values and calculates a SIP projection, with mobile-friendly form layout and clear results presentation.
Create an “About Us” page for InvestSmart AI.
Create a “Disclaimer” page that clearly states the content is educational only and explicitly “Not SEBI advice”.

Apply the requested UI style and tone across all pages: fintech colors (blue/white/green), minimal Groww/Upstox-like design, mobile-friendly layout, simple English, GenZ-friendly copy, and avoid complex jargon.
Add required generated brand assets to the app as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (header/hero) without routing image delivery through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create fintech-style homepage with risk-profiling explanation, “Get My Investment Plan” CTA, and educational sections (why invest, compounding, risk vs return, diversification).
Implement core InvestSmart AI chatbot risk-profiling flow (collect user age, income, goal, horizon, risk tolerance, knowledge; classify conservative/moderate/aggressive).
Generate investment recommendation output (risk profile result, asset allocation, monthly SIP suggestion, 3 model portfolios, do’s & don’ts; include pie chart if possible).
Add Disclaimer page stating educational only / not SEBI advice.
Apply UI/UX and content tone guidelines: fintech colors (blue/white/green), minimal Groww/Upstox-like style, mobile friendly, simple English, GenZ-friendly tone.
Add backend logic (single Motoko actor) to classify a completed user profile into exactly one of: Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive, and return the classification to the frontend.

Add backend logic (single Motoko actor) to generate investment recommendations based on the user’s classification using the exact asset allocation rules provided for Conservative, Moderate, and Aggressive profiles, and return a structured response to the frontend.
